kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : psycopg2.connect(database=ninjapixel, user=postgres, password=qaninja, host=pgdb, port=5432)

kw.doc: Delete all the rows within a given table. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
